fluid_condition.description: The fluid condition type to check the fluid state at the position.

type.description:
[Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/fluid)

Checks the fluid state of the current position with a [Fluid Condition Type](../fluid_condition_types.md).

Type ID: `origins:fluid`
